We can not filter on several logger from the logger tree.

It would be nice to have this feature

creator: sdeboy@iname.com
text:
This is available in the svn HEAD revision of Chainsaw through a couple of options:
1. Creating a filtering expression from the logger tree
 - right click on a logger and choose 'set refine focus field to (loggername)'
 - to include additional loggers, right click on a different logger and choose 'add (loggername) to refine focus field'

2. Hiding all loggers and then unhiding selected loggers
 - if you want to show only loggers com.package.package2 and com.packagea.package1, right-click on the com.package node in the tree and select 'ignore loggers below selection' (all loggers below this entry will be added to the 'ignore loggers' list)
 - for any logger you want to see, right-click on the logger and select the the 'ignore (loggername)' option (it's a toggle)
sweet, I think a Ctrl-click as shortcut to this would be really handy :)
